resources.string: Don\'t worry!\nAs an Asset Issuer you are able to create new ones using the Asset Factory.\nOnce created, all the assets you publish there, will be stored in this Asset Issuer Wallet.
Don\'t worry!\nUse the community app to connect to Asset Issuers and/or other Asset Users like you, and then you will be able to receive assets from them !
Don\'t worry!\nTo act as a Redeem Point you need to use the Community App to connect your device to an Assets Issuer whose assets you want to redeem.
Fermat has detected an exception. Please try again.
Please enter the number of assets to deliver
There is no assets to distribute
There is no assets to appropriate
There are not enough assets to distribute
Are you sure that the entered information is correct? This action is irreversible
Are you sure you want to do this? This action is irreversible
Are you sure you want to appropriate this asset? This action is irreversible
Are you sure you want to deliver this asset? This action is irreversible
Assets are being delivered. It may take a couple of minutes to confirm or rollback depending on your network connection.
Appropriation of the asset has started successfully. The process will be completed in a couple of minutes.
Can\'t select user, not enough available assets to deliver
Can\'t select group, not enough available assets to deliver
Use it for distribution of assets.
Features: Assets storage, distribution (to Asset Users), statistics.\n\nNOTE: Assets must be created first in Asset Factory.
* You will be able to edit your profile in the Asset Issuer Identity application.
Detailed information of the asset. Displays the value of transaction, status and date-time of them.
List of those users who appropriated the asset instead of redeem it.
Displays a list of assets and the delivery status of them. They can be: Appropriated, Redeemed or Unused.
List of assets redeemed, at which Redeem Point, and statistics to analyse your campaigns results.

On this section you will be able to identify the users you are going to deliver this asset to.

You can deliver as many assets as you have to any connected user.

If no users are available, you will have to connect to them using the User Community application.

You can also deliver your assets to entire groups of users.

If you have many users you are already connected to, it may be better to organize them in groups.

You can accomplish this from the Asset User Community application.

Use this screen to select users/groups that you are connected to.

If no users/groups are available, you need to connect to them from the Asset User Community application.

Use this application to identify and connect to users/groups and they will be permanently available to receive your assets.
